channel.title: Aesthetic additions
channel.description:
**Dead bodies in physician room** after a physician exhumes someone, that body should show up on one of the cots in their room the rest of the game (replaced when they exhume someone else, of course).
**Fool laugh maniacally as they are executed** Just like a back-and-forth head movement upwards and down, accompanied by the gripping of the chest. Doesn't actually need laughter noises.
**Scorned laugh maniacally as they win** same thing, but they are pointing to them while gripping their chest and mostly doing a forward movement. It would show it right before they are executed, or after, similar to hunter's retribution.
**Soul container for reaper** In the reaper's room, there will be a scythe hanging on the wall. AT the end where the blade meets the stitch will be a large glass sphere, filled with slightly moving lights. Number of light would range from 1, 2, 3, and just being full of light.
Notice: I know that he scorned one might limit a person from claiming scorned, but most scorned claims get killed anyway.
The other ones don't hinder gameplay at all.

item.title: Aesthetic additions
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I have been in BD games where people allowed a scorned who had his targets die to stay alive, so they could become neutral king.

However, unless they really need the votes (and I mean late game as in they know who the unseen are), they will just kill the scorned, or the prince will.

item.title: Aesthetic additions
item.dc:creator: Alkander
item.description:
I like all of these except for the Scorned one.

Confirmation in this game is something to stay away from. That would confirm a scorned claim (or out a fake claim).
BUT all this goes out the window if it is after death of a character (since they get confirmed as they die anyway). So the fool laughing is PERFECT, they die, nothing can be done after this so its fine to add some flair. I imagine this as something from the Joker in Batman… laughing maniacally right before he dies!

My thoughts for the Scorned is that after the real scorned is dead, some type of graphic/ sound can be done to signify that they WON as scorned… since some people might not know if they did, or see the end screen.
